ClozeTests.question: The government’s decision to print unlimited Fish Reserve Notes led to ___________, causing a decline in the value of currency.
The Clean Rocks Jobs Program was a ___________ initiative that failed to deliver long-term economic benefits.
As more Fish Reserve Notes were issued, the islanders’ savings were ___________ due to the loss of value in currency.
In Chapter 10, the government’s response to inflation included setting ___________ controls and creating more government jobs.
The government’s use of Fish Reserve Notes is compared to ___________ policies in many Western economies after the 2008 financial crisis.
